name: Star Fall (BrandonLeffew)
description:
This is a game I'm currently working on, the game will be updated as i make modifications.DEV NOTE: right now missles are unlimited and have no cooldown neither do lasers also if you die in its current state you will have to refresh the page

  • Controls
    • Movement
      • Forward - Up arrow
      • Backward - Back Arrow
      • Left - Left Arrow
      • Right - Right arrow
    • Weapons
      • "z" - fire lasers
      • "x" - fire missles
